headerDescription: Decentralizované finance, Sokromé transakce & šifrované zprávy
labsTeaser: Chcete s Conceal vytvořit něco skvělého?
about1: Conceal Network je bezpečný peer-to-peer protokol pro ochranu soukromí, který umožňuje jednotlivcům a organizacím anonymně komunikovat a finančně spolupracovat v decentralizovaném prostředí odolném vůči cenzuře.
about2: Conceal Network provozuje kryptoměnu $CCX, což je open source digitální peněžní systém s ochranou soukromí, který napodobuje fyzickou hotovost; nikdo neví, kde své $CCX ukládáte nebo utrácíte.  Všechny transakce, vklady a zprávy v síti Conceal Network jsou nevystopovatelné, odolné proti manipulaci a díky použití kryptografických protokolů fungují bez centrální autority.
about3: Conceal Network je komunitou řízená, skutečně decentralizovaná blockchainová banka, která je přístupná všem bez ohledu na sociální či finanční status a geografickou polohu. Conceal Network nikdo nevlastní a každý se jí může účastnit zdarma.
aboutBankingDeposits: Vklady tvoří páteř ekosystému Conceal a poskytující uživatelům decentralizovanou a rovnostářskou formu cold stakingu, která přináší úroky z uzamčených vkladů.
aboutEncryptedMessages: Skutečně soukromá, decentralizovaná, anonymní, nevystopovatelná a end-to-end šifrovaná služba pro zasílání zpráv, která funguje na blockchainu a umožňující samodestrukci zpráv.
aboutUsingConceal: Conceal Desktop je centrální místem interakce pro hlavní funkce Concealu a je k dispozici pro všechny hlavní platformy. Pomocí aplikace Conceal Desktop můžete odesílat a přijímat CCX, šifrované zprávy a také spravovat své vklady.
aboutGettingCCX: Nejjednodušší způsob, jak získat CCX, je těžit s GPU pomocí některého z minerů. Vyzkoušejte třeba náš.
aboutInitialCommitMilestone: Je venku první release, Testnet, Daemon, Miner a peněženka jsou spuštěny. Začíná něco opravdu velkého.
aboutEncryptedMessagingAndDepositsMilest: Jsou spuštěny inovativní bankovní funkce využívající vklady s úrokovými sazbami s podprorou cold staking a samodestruktivních šifrovaných zpráv.  Wow!
aboutWebsiteAndBlockExplorerMilestone: Vznikají oficiální webové stránky, které jsou ústředním informačním místem projektu. Je vydán Průzkumník bloků.  Jsme v ohni!
aboutExchangeListingAndInvestmentsMilest: CCX je zalistován na burze STEX a systém vkladů je přepracován tak, aby podporoval investice.  Zásoba roste!
aboutCustomAlgorithmMilestone: Algoritmus Cryptonote Conceal Proof-of-Work je uvolněn tak, aby byl odolný vůči FPGA, ASIC a Nicehash.  Moc malým lidem!
aboutConcealCloudMilestone: Conceal Cloud nabízí bezpečnou, výkonnou a funkčně bohatou webovou peněženku pro CCX. Přijetí raketově roste!
aboutConcealLabsMilestone: Společnost Conceal Labs nabízí každému možnost nechat si platit za vytváření skvělých věcí pomocí Concealu. Komunita se rozrůstá!
aboutConcealMobileMilestone: Conceal Mobile nabízí robustní mobilní peněženku se šifrovanými zprávami. Obliba zpráv roste!
aboutConcealPayMilestone: Conceal Pay is launched making it simple for anyone to accept payments or donations in CCX. Volume expands!
aboutConcealIDMilestone: Conceal ID je spuštěno, nabízí zapamatovatelné adresy aka přezdívky. Zlepšuje se snadnost a využití!
aboutdaemonAndWalletImprovementsMileston: Vyšla nová verze Conceal Desktop v6 s různými vylepšeními rozhraní a daemonu.  Začínáme mít fantazii!
aboutMiningAlgorithmMilestone: The CN-GPU Proof-of-Work algorithm isFPGA, ASIC, Botnet & Nicehash resistant. Power to the little people!
aboutwCCXETHMilestoneMilestone: Wrapped CCX is created on ethereum blockchain allowing CCX owners to access DEFI on ETH!
wCCXUniAndTrustMilestone: wCCX on Uniswap and in Trustwallet
aboutwCCXUniAndTrustMilestone: wCCX is available on the hottest DEX at the time and added to Trustwallet.
aboutDepositsCloundAndMobileMilestone: Cold staking came to cloud and mobile. You are able to earn interest from your phone!
aboutSelfDestructCloundAndMobileMileston: Send messages to other users that self destruct after given time.
aboutSwapMilestone: Swap your CCX to wCCX and back the other way with our swap tool.
aboutCLiveMilestone: Decentralized p2p and end to end encrypted platform for video / audio calls and messages.
aboutCHub01Milestone: Initial release of cross platform application with Wallet module as first supported module
aboutCHub02Milestone: Second release with Deposit and ID modules
aboutStableDepositsMilestone: Deposits pegged to a stable asset, giving you peace of mind, while gaining interest.
collabText: BECOME A PART OF THE PROJECT
helpdeskTitle: DO YOU HAVE A PROBLEM OR NEED TO CONTACT US?
whereToFindUsInfo1: Nejlepší místo, kde se dozvíte více, je navštívit naše
whereToFindUsInfo2: kanál. Zdrojový kód a další verze najdete na adrese
otherWaysToFindUs: Zde jsou všechny další způsoby, kde nás můžete najít online.
mobileTitle: A secure, feature rich, and mobile Conceal wallet
mobileAbout: We aim to make the Conceal crypto-currency as easy to use as possible. With Conceal Mobile you have a wallet that is secure, fast, and easy to use on the go.
mobileWalletsText: Conceal Mobile supports multiple wallets, each with it's own address so you can use them for different purposes.
mobileMessagesText: Try sending encrypted messages over the blockchain. The messages work in the cloud, desktop and mobile wallets. Nobody but you and the recipient can see what is being sent.
mobilePaymentsText: Easily accept payments from family, friends or anyone, anywhere.
mobileBookText: No need to copy / paste addresses every time. Maintain your address book for easy sending and receiving of funds.
mobileMarketText: You can easily stay up to date with live market data on the go.
bankingAbout: Conceal Banking removes unnecessary intermediaries by giving everyone the power to deposit their funds on the Blockchain and recieve interest in exchange.
bankingBlockchainTitle: BUILT WITH THE POWER OF THE BLOCKCHAIN
bankingBlockchainText: Conceal Banking is completely decentralized and built on the Conceal Blockchain.
bankingDepositsText: Conceal Banking empowers anyone in the world to deposit their funds in exchange for interest.
bankingWorldwideText: There are millions without access to financial services worldwide. Conceal Banking provides much needed access to anyone, anywhere.
bankingFundsSafeText: When you deposit your funds with Conceal Banking they are cold staked on the blockchain for safekeeping.
bankingSavingsTitle: EARN MORE THAN A SAVINGS ACCOUNT
bankingSavingsText: Deposits with Conceal Banking earn significantly more than a savings account, as much as 6% APR plus compounding.
idAbout: Our aim is for Conceal to be ubiquitious and we realize that public keys are hard to remember and recognize. With Conceal ID we aim to solve the problem by enabling memorable and recognizable names to be used as addresses.
idSecurityTitle: Built with the security of OpenID
idSecurityText: There is not always a good reason to reinvent the wheel. We carefully chose the proven and widely utilized OpenID protocol to power Conceal ID.
idCloudTitle: BUILT ON THE POWER OF THE CONCEAL CLOUD
idCloudText: Conceal ID is seamlessly integrated with the Conceal Cloud for absolute ease of use.
idShareText: Send us some CCX at team.conceal.id - it works! Easily share your custom, memorable and recognizable Conceal ID with anyone.
idPaymentsText: Your Conceal ID makes it simpler to accept donations or payments from customers and friends.
idIntegrationText: Built with an API for integration with your favorite platform or app.
messagingAbout: Conceal Messaging expands our ecosystem by providing fully integrated encrypted messaging on the Blockchain.
messagingDestructText: Conceal Messaging supports self-destructing messages that delete themselves after being read.
messagingVarietyText: Conceal Messaging works in the Conceal Cloud, Desktop and Mobile.
messagingDecentralizedText: Conceal Messaging is a decentralized service that operates on the Blockchain.
messagingBookText: There is no need to copy / paste an address every time. Maintain your address book for easily sending messages to your contacts.
messagingEncryptedText: All Conceal Messages are encrypted and cannot be read by anyone other than the sender and receiver.
cLiveTitle: Conceal Live (Clive), is a powerful privacy-protected communications software that offers peer-to-peer and end-to-end encrypted audio, video and messaging services for free.
cLiveAbout1: Clive is free to the public and is also offered advertisement free. This private communication client is currently available for Android and Windows users with a possible future release for iOS.
cLiveAbout2: Clive brings private communications back to the people.
cLiveSecureText: Clive connections are fully end-to-end encrypted. All Clive data is only stored on the device where Clive is installed.
cLiveNoServersText1: Because all connections are peer-to-peer and end-to-end encrypted, Clive does not rely on any central authority or servers to operate. Latency and transfer speeds are greatly reduced thanks to the direct peer-to-peer connections.
cLiveNoServersText2: Autonomous users who are on the same local network can communicate even if they are disconnected from the internet.
cLiveConferenceText: Clive offers unlimited audio and video conferences. There are no limits to the number of participants or the length of calls. You are only limited by your own resources.
cLiveExperienceText: Share images, audio or files without any size limitations. Use emojis and other standard chatting features in a private and secure manner.
cLiveFlexibleText: Clive comes with many customizable options and works on multiple platforms.
cLiveFooterText1: Clive is a wonderful perk we offer to the world and is just another great tool in the Conceal ecosystem that is always expanding.
cLiveFooterText2: Enjoy Clive and the Conceal lifestyle!
payAbout: Conceal Pay makes it simple for businesses and people to receive payments on the Conceal Network.
payBlockchainTitle: BUILT WITH THE POWER OF THE BLOCKCHAIN
payBlockchainText: Conceal Pay empowers businesses and people to easily accept payments on the Conceal Blockchain.
payCloudTitle: BUILT ON THE POWER OF THE CONCEAL CLOUD
payCloudText: Conceal Pay is seamlessly integrated with the Conceal Cloud for absolute ease of use.
payLinksText: Easily create URLs with a simple web page where customers and friends can send you payments.
paySimpleText: Conceal Pay makes it trivial for you or your business to receive payments online.
payIntegrationText: Built with an API for quick integration to start receiving payments on your website.
labsAbout: We strive to grow a broad ecosystem by supporting the community. Conceal Labs provides developers, entrepreneurs & creators with the jump start that they need to make vision a reality.
labsIdeaText: Do you have a project that involves Conceal in some way? <a href='https://discord.gg/YbpHVSd'>We want to hear about it!
labsMoneyText: Sometimes money is just what it takes to get your idea off the ground.
labsFundsText: Our creators set aside funds for the community to use for projects.
labsListedText: Get funded by us and we will list your project here on our website.
labsProjectsText: Check out some of the cool projects we have funded. Apply to be next!
labsFooterText: Coming soon to a browser near you!
aboutAbout: Our aim is for Conceal to be ubiquitious and we realize that public keys are hard to remember and recognize. With Conceal ID we aim to solve the problem by enabling memorable and recognizable names to be used as addresses.
aboutWhatIsText1: Conceal is a decentralized blockchain bank, with deposits and investments paying interest rates, without involvement of financial institutions, powered by 100% open source code.
aboutWhatIsText2: Conceal enables untraceable and anonymous messaging, and a secure way to transfer funds. Using a distributed public ledger, the sender and receiver are kept anonymous, a key concern in a post Snowden world. Hackers cannot trace money or messages when the messages are sent across public networks.
aboutWhatIsText3: Conceal Cryptocurrency (₡CCX) is based on the Cryptonote protocol and runs on a secure peer-to-peer network technology to operate with no central authority. You control the private keys to your funds.
aboutWhatIsText4: Conceal is accessible by anyone in the world regardless of their geographic location or status. Our blockchain is resistant to any kind of analysis. All your CCX transactions and messages are anonymous.
aboutWhatIsText5: Conceal avoids many concerns, e.g. technological, environment impact, reputational and security, of Bitcoin, and provides a glimpse of the future.
aboutWhatIsText6: Conceal is open-source, community driven and truly decentralized.
aboutWhatIsText7: No one owns Conceal, everyone can take part.
aboutVisionText1: At Conceal, we believe that access to knowledge is what truly allows great ideas to flourish and diverse communities to grow.
aboutVisionText2: We believe that Conceal is what the community decides it to be and that decisions on how to grow the protocol should involve everyone. Hackers cannot trace money or messages when the messages are sent across public networks.
aboutFeaturesPrivateText: Conceal uses ring signatures and one-time addresses for truly anonymous payments
aboutFeaturesUntraceableText: Conceal's transactions can't be linked between the sender and the recipient
aboutFeaturesDecentralizedText: Conceal follows Satoshi Nakamoto's original vision of decentralized, trustless cryptocurrency, i.e. a secure digital cash operated by a network of users. Transactions are confirmed by distributed consensus, and then recorded on the blockchain immutably. Third parties do not need to be trusted to keep your money safe.
aboutFeaturesFungibleText: Conceal is truly fungible, thanks to built-in privacy features. Just like cash, all coins are equal, changeable. It is extremely unlikely that a coin will ever be blacklisted by any party due to its association in previous transactions.
aboutFeaturesScalableText: Future scalability initiatives will include a modular sidechain.
aboutFeaturesCommunityText: No one owns Conceal. Everyone can take part. Developed, maintained and funded by volunteers
aboutFeaturesSimpleText: Easy to use Desktop and CLI clients.
aboutFeaturesPlatformsText: Available for PC, Mac, Ubuntu and Android
aboutFeaturesPoWText: PoW hash function is designed for egalitarian CPU & GPU mining and ASIC Resistance
aboutFeaturesLimitsText: Conceal intelligently adjusts its parameters based on the historical data
aboutFeaturesMessagesText: Secure your confidentiality with an encrypted P2P network, secure communications and encrypted self-destructive messages
aboutFeaturesBankingText: Decentralized Deposits on the chain that give up to 6% interest rate per year
aboutSpecsPoWText: Proof of work with 100% rewards that go to miners and more then 100 years of mining
aboutSpecsDepositsText: Up to 6% interest rate per year
aboutSpecsPremineText: 6% of the max supply locked over a 5 years interval
aboutSpecsRewardText: Block reward is a constant 6 CCX per block, making CCX a very low inflation asset.
aboutSpecsAddressesText: Wallet addresses are a string of 98 characters starting with 'ccx7'
mediaAMAText: Despite our focus on privacy Conceal is not going unnoticed in the media. We've received attention from an ever-growing number of major publications and notable influencers.
mediaArticlesText: We are constantly improving our ecoystem. You can read about our jurney and what is being done in the series of articles bellow.
mediaMiningText: Conceal is 100% PoW crypto currency. Learn how to mine it and what are best practices to do so.
mediaVideosText: Conceal sparked a lot of videos about it. We tried to gather them in one place for you, so its easily to access information.
mediaUpdatesText: We are always working to improve our ecoystem. You can read all monthly updates, where we gather all the milestones and changes we made so far.
communityAboutText: Conceal has a huge thriving community of awesome people that are sharing ideas, working together and helping each other regardless of where they are in their Blockchain journey. What are you waiting for?
landingFooterTitle: Conceal.Network is a decentralized blockchain bank, with deposits and investments paying interest rates, without involvement of financial institutions, powered by 100% open source code.
